price: Dájúdájú Àwa tẹ àwọn àpáta lórí ba tí wọ́n ń ṣe àfọ̀mọ́ pẹ̀lú rẹ̀ (fún Allāhu) ní ìrọ̀lẹ́ àti nígbà tí òòrùn bá yọ (ní òwúrọ̀).
arabic: إِنَّا سَخَّرۡنَا ٱلۡجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحۡنَ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ وَٱلۡإِشۡرَاقِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innā sakharnā al-jibāla maʿahu yusabbiḥ'na bil-ʿashiyi wal-ish'rāqi
